pullRequest.title: Prune Eth1DataCache based on latest block timestamp
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Remove Eth1DataCache's dependency on tick and slot events by pruning the cache purely based on the timestamp of the latest block.

commit.message: Prune Eth1DataCache based on latest block timestamp rather than tick or slot events.

nodes.bodyText: This one I do not understand the reasoning well but I do get that a buffer is necessary anyway.
I think this only needs to be 1 * ETH1_FOLLOW_DISTANCE prior, because the latest block events coming from Eth1DataManager already have time, t = (t - (Eth1 Follow Distance Time) + Request Buffer))
